    Introduction to {evprof}

    evprof.Rmd

    An EV user profile can be defined basically for two variables:

    • Connection start time
    • Connection duration

    Based on these two variables this package aims to provide tools to analyze and define different user profiles with similar flexibility potential.

    The workflow of this analysis should be:

    1. Data exploratory analysis
    2. Preprocessing
    3. Clustering
    4. Profiling
    5. Modelling

    Developed by Marc Cañigueral.

    Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
